function_declarations.name: read_project_dna
function_declarations.description: Read the current project DNA from the FAF Source of Truth. Use this to understand the project context, goals, stack, and current state.

function_declarations.name: update_project_dna
function_declarations.description: Update the project DNA via voice command. Use this when the user wants to change project focus, status, phase, goals, or any other DNA field. Changes are committed directly to GitHub.

updates.description: Key-value pairs to update. Use dot notation for nested fields (e.g., 'state.focus', 'project.goal', 'state.phase')

message.description: Optional commit message describing the change
